sentences.en: A lot of work has been put into the short preview.
sentences.cn: 这个简短的预演投入了大量的工作.

sentences.en: After a sneak preview of the film they decided to shelve it.
sentences.cn: 该影片在试映后,他们决定把它搁置起来.

sentences.en: Free visitor invitation, badge, admission tickets, exhibits preview etc.
sentences.cn: 免费的观众邀请, 免费的观众参展证 、 门票及展前预览等等.

sentences.en: He had gone to see the preview of a play.
sentences.cn: 他去看一场戏剧的预演了。

sentences.en: High - speed 3 D graphic simulation: it can show a preview before process.
sentences.cn: 快速三维图形仿真功能,可在加工前预览效果.

sentences.en: Imangination is everything. It is the preview of lifes coming attractions.
sentences.cn: 想象力就是一切, 它是生命将发生之事的预览.

sentences.en: Journalists will be able to preview the exhibition tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 新闻记者明天将可以参观预展。

sentences.en: One of the critics is coming over this morning for a preview.
sentences.cn: 一位评论家今天早上要来看预展.

sentences.en: Preview display: you can see the converting progress in preview window . 6.
sentences.cn: preview显示: 你可以看到转换的进展,在预览窗口中.

sentences.en: Preview for the total effect Choice of loops of the total effect.
sentences.cn: 预览总体效果的选择循环的总效果.

sentences.en: Preview mode: preview the clip without the scenes to be deleted.
sentences.cn: 预览模式: 预览剪辑中的场景予以删除.

sentences.en: the press preview of the show (= when people who write for newspapers, television etc could see it )
They attended a sneak preview of the winter fashion collection.
sentences.cn: 他们参观了一次对内的冬季时装预展.

sentences.en: They sent the recording for our preview.
sentences.cn: 他们把那录音送来给我们预先审查.

sentences.en: This is the preview picture, please click the link below to enter.
sentences.cn: 上面是预览图, 详情请点击下方连接进入.

sentences.en: Try using the Page Break Preview command on the View menu.
sentences.cn: 请尝试“视图”菜单中的“分页预览”命令.

sentences.en: We saw a preview of the new movie.
sentences.cn: 我们看了一部新电影的试映.

phrases.tran_cn: 影片未公开宣布的预演；内部预映；试映

trans.tran_en: an occasion when you can see a film, play, painting etc before it is shown to the public
to see or describe something before it is shown to the public
to see or describe something before it is shown to the public
